page.title: 20A day in the life of Rhys.
page.content: A typical day begins when I get up at 7.20 a.m. I go downstairs and switch on the T.V. to watch "Popeye". Mammy gets up at 7.30 and makes breakfast. At 7.45 I wake my father and I eat breakfast. At 8.30 I walk 200m. to school. Before school begins I play football on the yard. The bell goes at 9.00 and I go into the classroom, then the class goes into the hall for assembly. Service over we return to the classroom for lessons. At 10.30 we have play, we go back at 10.45 for more lessons. At 12.00 I go home for lunch. I am back in school by 12.30. Then it is more lessons from 1.00 until 3.30 with a break at 2.15 until 2.25. When I reach home I do my school homework, then I watch T.V. until dinner at 6.30.. I watch T.V. again, then I go and practise my trumpet and electric organ. I go to bed at 9.30..
